string-array.name: nlaBullets
string-array.item: Stereo Headset Designed for Wii U™

string-array.name: nlaDetails
string-array.item: Easily connects to the Wii U™ GamePad controller, and also works with the Nintendo 3DS, smartphones, and tablets.
Quick access to game volume and mic mute controls.
Block out distractions and immerse yourself in the game.
Soft padded ear cushions and twist-cup design to rest flat on your shoulders.

string-array.name: p11Details
string-array.item: Enhances game sounds for a more immersive experience
Premium sound from from full-bandwidth speaker drivers.
Lets you hear what you’re saying while communicating with others.
Adds more depth and realism to the game audio.
Allows personalized balancing of game and chat audio.
Also works with PC games and online chat.

string-array.name: p12Bullets
string-array.item: High-quality digital game \u0026 chat audio for PS4™
Awesome sound from full-range 50mm speakers \u0026 bass boost
Perfect for PS Vita™, tablets and mobile devices

string-array.name: p12Details
string-array.item: Get an amazing PlayStation® 4 audio experience with the Ear Force® P12. Designed specifically for PS4, the P12 is easy to set up and delivers thunderous amplified audio through 50mm speakers without disturbing others. P12 is also great for mobile gaming including PS Vita™!
P12 delivers high-quality digital and chat for an enhanced audio experience.
High-sensitivity microphone on a flexible boom keeps you heard loud and clear.
One simple USB connection delivers all game and chat audio.
Disconnect from the in-line amp to use the P12 on the go with your mobile devices including the PS Vita™.
Hear your voice in the headset so you don’t have to shout.
Full-range 50mm speakers supported by breathable, around-the-ear mesh ear cushions for hours of comfort and noise-isolation.
Dial up the thump with variable Bass Boost.
Master volume, Bass Boost and mic mute controls at your fingertips.

Headsets aren’t just great for games. Use the P12 for enjoying streaming movies and TV from Netflix™ and Hulu Plus™ or Blu-Ray Disc. Crank up your tunes on music services like Pandora™ and then chat with friends or make mobile calls!

string-array.name: p4cBullets
string-array.item: Slotted Ear Cut Design for Clear Game Audio

string-array.name: p4cDetails
string-array.item: The Ear Force® P4c Chat Communicator improves your PS4™ gaming experience, allowing you to communicate and strategize with your teammates more accurately and more comfortably than a standard communicator. The P4c features a 40mm speaker for incoming chat and a unique slotted ear cup design that lets you hear external game sound and chat at the same time, so you’ll never miss out on the game action.
High sensitivity microphone with flexible boom and premium 40mm speaker for high-fidelity chat.
Fully adjustable and lightweight with breathable, fabric mesh ear cushions for long gaming sessions.
Hear the game sound around you while you chat instead of blocking it with in-ear or on-ear communicators.
Allows for personalized balancing of chat volume.

string-array.name: plaDetails
string-array.item: Enhances game sounds for a more immersive experience.
Delivers bone-rattling bass and pure, crisp highs.
Lets you hear what you’re saying while communicating with others.
Built-in bass boost adds more depth and realism to the game audio.
Allows personalized balancing of game and chat sounds.
Also works with PC/Mac games and online chat.

string-array.name: px22Bullets
string-array.item: Works with PS3™, Xbox 360®, PC / Mac \u0026 Mobile

string-array.name: px22Details
string-array.item: Tune bass and treble levels to add depth and realism.
Separate game \u0026 chat volume controls plus mic mute right on the inline amp.
Automatically raises the volume of chat during intense, explosive game situations.
Breathable mesh cushions and soft, padded headband for hours of comfort.
Connect a mobile phone or digital media player to take calls or enjoy your favorite music while you game.
Adjust the volume of your voice in the headset while speaking.
No AC adapters or batteries ever required.
Delivers bone-rattling bass and pure, crisp highs.
Works with PS3™, Xbox 360®, PC / Mac and mobile devices like smartphones, tablets, PS Vita™ and more.

string-array.name: stealth400Bullets
string-array.item: Completely Wireless Game and Chat Audio for PS4™ \u0026 PS3™
Built-in Rechargeable Battery Provides Over 15 Hours of Play
Four EQ Presets, Including Treble and Bass Boosts
Separate Game and Chat Volume Controls

string-array.name: stealth400Details
string-array.item: It’s time to ditch the wires. The Turtle Beach® Ear Force® Stealth 400 eliminates wires to your controller or console so you can have interference-free, totally wireless audio on PS4 or PS3. Plus the slick new headset is designed for comfort and allows quick access to game and chat volume controls.
Intelligent channel hopping for an interference-free wireless experience.
Built-in rechargeable battery delivers over 15 hours of wireless gaming.
Personalize your audio with extra bass, treble or a combo or both.
Set game and chat volume levels right on the headset.
Acoustically angled, large 50mm Neodymium speakers deliver butt-kicking audio.
Use the included Mobile Cable* for wired gaming, music and movies on PS Vita™ or any mobile device.
Never Miss a Text or Call
Hook up your mobile phone to hear text notifications or take calls while gaming.
Breathable, around-the-ear mesh ear cushions for hours of comfort and noise-isolation.
Mic Monitoring lets you hear your own voice in the headset to avoid shouting.
Be heard clearly through an adjustable high-sensitivity mic you can remove when on the go.
Headsets aren’t just great for games. Use the Stealth 400 for enjoying streaming video, Blu-Ray Disc movies, music and chatting with friends!
*Mobile device support for wired phone calls and stereo audio only.

string-array.name: stealth500PBullets
string-array.item: Immersive DTS Headphone: X 7.1 Channel Surround Sound
DTS Surround Sound Modes, Each with EQ Presets
Built-in Rechargeable Battery Provides Over 15 Hours of Play

string-array.name: stealth500PDetails
string-array.item: The Turtle Beach® Ear Force® Stealth 500P Wireless Gaming Headset brings immersive DTS Headphone:X 7.1 Channel Surround Sound to PS4 and PS3. The all-new headset design, with 50mm Neodymium speakers, allows for quick access to vital audio customization and controls, plus its rechargeable battery delivers over 15 gaming hours per charge.
DTS Headphone:X delivers an amazing, 3D 360-degree sound stage with unmatched spatial accuracy.
Intelligent channel hopping for an interference-free wireless experience.
Custom DTS Surround Sound Modes, each with four EQ Presets, further immerse you in your favorite games, movies and music.
Built-in rechargeable battery delivers over 15 hours of wireless gaming.
Set your mix of game and chat volume levels right on the headset.
Synthetic leather ear cushions provide hours of comfort and noise-isolation.
Be heard clearly through an adjustable, high-sensitivity, removable mic.
Mic Monitoring lets you hear your own voice in the headset to avoid shouting.
Never Miss a Text or Call
Hook up your mobile phone to hear text notifications or take calls while gaming.
Connect the included Mobile Cable for wired gaming on any mobile device.

string-array.name: stealth500XBullets
string-array.item: Completely Wireless Game and Chat Audio for Xbox One
Immersive DTS Headphone:X 7.1 Channel Surround Sound
DTS Surround Sound Modes, Each with Genre-Based Presets
Dynamic Chat Boost™ and Mic Monitoring

string-array.name: stealth500XDetails
string-array.item: No controller adapters, no cables, just completely wireless DTS Headphone: X 7.1 Channel Surround Sound that puts you in the center of the action. Designed for Xbox One, the powerful Turtle Beach® Ear Force® Stealth 500X delivers immersive, interference-free wireless audio quality at up to 15 hours per charge.
Intelligent channel hopping for an interference-free wireless experience.
DTS Headphone:X delivers an amazing, 3D 360-degree sound stage with unmatched spatial accuracy.
Custom DTS Surround Sound modes immerse you in your favorite games, movies and music.
DTS Surround Sound Modes each with genre-based presets to further customize your audio.
Built-in rechargeable battery delivers up to 15 hours of wireless gaming.
Set your mix of game and chat volume levels right on the headset.
Mic Monitoring lets you hear your own voice in the headset to avoid shouting.
Even during loud gameplay spikes, chat volume automatically rises to ensure you never miss a command.
Never Miss a Text or Call
Hook up your mobile phone to hear text notifications or take calls while gaming.
Connect the included Mobile Cable for wired gaming on any mobile device.
Enjoy wireless Xbox One audio for streaming video, music and even Skype with friends.

string-array.name: x12Details
string-array.item: Enhances game sounds for a more immersive experience.
Premium sound from full-bandwidth speaker drivers.
Hear your voice in the headset, so you won’t have to shout to hear what you are saying.
Add depth and realism to the gaming experience with strong yet clear bass.
Allow personalized balancing of game and chat sounds.
Delivers the ultimate gaming experience for Xbox 360 and PC.
No batteries or AC adapter required.

string-array.name: x32Details
string-array.item: Selects the optimum frequency in the 2.4GHz/5GHz spectrums, virtually eliminating interference.
Uncompressed digital audio signal provides CD-quality game sound.
Enhances game sounds for a more immersive experience.
Chat volume automatically increases as the game volume gets louder.
Multiple EQ presets including bass and treble boost combinations.
Boost the sound levels on the left and right sides for better tactical accuracy.
Connect a digital music player and listen to your favorite songs while gaming.
Hear your voice in the headset so you won’t have to shout.
Allows for personalized balancing of game and chat audio.
Delivers superior audio quality with crisp highs and deep, rumbling lows.

string-array.name: xl1Details
string-array.item: Enhances game sounds for a more immersive experience.
Delivers bone-rattling bass and pure, crisp highs.
Lets you hear what you’re saying while communicating with others.
Built-in bass boost adds more depth and realism to the game audio.
Allows personalized balancing of game and chat sounds.

string-array.name: xofourBullets
string-array.item: Wireless to the Xbox One Console

string-array.name: xofourDetails
string-array.item: The Ear Force® XO FOUR is the perfect audio upgrade for the Xbox One™ delivering high quality sound to get the most from your games, music, TV and movies. Stay connected to friends through Xbox Live® and Skype™ with clear, crisp chat audio and microphone clarity on Turtle Beach headsets deliver.
Headphones are tuned to provide the highest quality audio from Xbox One™ Audio Adapter.
High-quality removable mic for chat on Xbox One™, Skype™ and Xbox Live®.
Adjust fame and chat volume for the perfect audio mix.
Use the XO FOUR anywhere with your tablet or portable game consoles.
A soft, comfortable leather headband and mesh ear cushions provide all-day comfort.
New headset look and feel complements iconic design of Xbox One™.
Headsets aren’t just great for games. Enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows with superior quality sound. Then crank up your tunes from music services like Xbox Music™ or Skype™ with friends!

string-array.name: xooneBullets
string-array.item: Wireless to the Xbox One Console
Full chat functionality including mic mute
Bass Boost for powerful, rumbling lows
Variable Mic Monitor so you can hear yourself in the headset

string-array.name: xooneDetails
string-array.item: Boost your gaming experience with the all-new Ear Force® XO ONE Stereo Gaming Headset from Turtle Beach. Designed to deliver Xbox One™ game and chat audio straight to your ears, you’ll hear every detail of your favorite games, movies and more through powerful, 50mm speakers.
Premium 50mm speakers generate crisp highs and thumping lows.
Ear Force XO Headset Audio Controller
Included Audio Controller puts Game-Chat Mix, Mic Mute, adjustable Mic Monitoring, Bass Boost and Master Volume controls at your fingertips.
High-sensitivity, removable mic for chat on Xbox Live and Skype™.
Smaller and lighter headset design with around-the-ear, mesh ear cushions for longer game sessions.
Disconnect from the Audio Controller to use the XO ONE with your mobile devices.
XO ONE isn’t just great for games. Enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows with high quality sound. Then crank up your tunes from music services like Xbox Music™ or Skype™ with friends!

string-array.name: xosevenBullets
string-array.item: Wireless to the Xbox One Console

string-array.name: xosevenDetails
string-array.item: The Ear Force XO SEVEN is the ultimate companion for the Xbox One™, built with tournament grade durability and superior quality audio components. Experience everything Xbox One™ has to offer and get the most from your games, music, TV shows and movies.
Memory foam cushions create a noise-isolating barrier to outside distractions.
Headphones are tuned to provide the highest quality audio from the Xbox One Audio Adapter.
Customize the XO SEVEN with swappable speaker plates available in dozens of designs from turtlebeach.com/customizedplates
Chat in game or with friends on Skype and Xbox LIVE using the high-quality, competition proven, noise-cancelling mic.
Adjust game and chat volume for the perfect mix.
Remove the mic, swap in the mobile cable with inline mic and use the XO SEVEN with all your mobile devices.

Ear Force Atlas isn’t just great for Titanfall. Enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows with superior quality sound. Then crank up your tunes from music services like Xbox Music™ or Skype™ with friends!
Perfect for gaming on your mobile phone, tablet or portable game devices.
Delivers superior audio quality with crisp highs and deep, rumbling lows.

string-array.name: z11Details
string-array.item: Delivers more realistic directional audio perception.
Quick access to game volume and mic mute controls.
Easily connects to most PC and Mac® computers as well as mobile devices and tablets.
Built for marathon game sessions with breathable mesh ear cushions and durable design.
Amazing Audio Quality Ear Force Z11
Amplified 50mm speakers set in acoustically tuned ear cups for high-fidelity audio.
High-sensitivity microphone with flexible boom for clear communication.

string-array.name: z60Details
string-array.item: Unleash powerful 7.1 channel DTS Headphone:X Surround Sound on any PC or Mac with the Ear Force® Z60. Delivering incredible bass response through PC gaming’s largest speakers, get the audio advantage from Surround Sound Audio Modes, Dynamic Chat Boost™ and fingertip audio controls with no software to install!

DTS Headphone:X delivers an amazing, 3D 360-degree sound stage with unmatched accuracy. And with a button press, custom DTS Surround Sound modes will completely immerse you in your favorite games, movies and music.
Thunderous 60mm speakers supported by breathable, around-the-ear mesh ear cushions for hours of comfort and noise-isolation.
Immersive DTS Surround Sound Audio Modes place you in the middle of the action.
Simple Plug and Play USB Setup
Simple USB setup with no software to install or manage.
Chat volume automatically increases as the game volume gets louder so you never miss a command.
Pop out the mic, disconnect from the control unit and use the Z60 on with all your mobile devices.
Hear your voice in the headset while speaking, so you never have to shout.
Convenient fingertip controls including separate game and chat volume controls.
For All Your PC Audio Needs

Headsets aren’t just great for games. Use the Z60 and its Surround Modes for enjoying streaming movies and TV from Netflix™ or Hulu Plus™. Crank up your tunes on music services like Pandora™ and then Skype™ with friends or make PC calls!

string-array.name: recon320Bullets
string-array.item: In-line Controls for Volume and Mic Mute

string-array.name: recon320Details
string-array.item: Place yourself in the middle of the action with the Ear Force® Recon 320 Surround Sound Gaming Headset. Pinpoint audio cues with amazing Dolby 7.1 Surround Sound†, enjoy hours of comfort and noise-isolation with around-the-ear, breathable mesh ear cushions and personalize the Recon 320 with swappable speaker plates.
Dolby 7.1 Surround Sound takes the excitement of your games to the next level and truly immerses you in the action with more depth, realism and spatial accuracy.
Amplified 50mm Neodymium speakers deliver crisp highs and powerful lows.
Personalize the look of your Recon 320 with a new design from TurtleBeach.com/plates.
Convenient in-line PC controls for volume and microphone mute.
Remove the mic boom and connect the Mobile Cable with In-Line Mic to use your Recon 320 with all your mobile devices.
High-sensitivity microphone on a flexible, removable boom keeps you heard loud and clear.
A single USB connection for PC or a 3.5mm jack on mobile devices.
*Mobile set up does not support surround sound.

†Dolby Surround Sound via free software download from www.turtlebeach.com/Recon320. Dolby Surround Sound driver is only compatible with Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows 8.1. Please note that Windows XP and Windows Vista users will get game audio in stereo.

string-array.name: elite800Bullets
string-array.item: Active Noise Cancellation for Console and Mobile Use
DTS Headphone: X 7.1 Channel Surround Sound
DTS Surround Sound Modes, Each with Genre-Based Presets

string-array.name: elite800Details
string-array.item: Welcome to the future of gaming audio with the Turtle Beach Elite 800. Sporting Active Noise Cancellation, DTS Headphone:X 7.1 Channel Surround Sound and DTS Surround Sound modes for outstanding audio quality, Bluetooth and dual invisible boom-less mics also make it a perfect mobile headset. And with registration, you also get membership into the Turtle Beach Elite Program.
Eliminate unwanted distractions with active noise cancellation in console and mobile modes.
Intelligent channel hopping for an interference-free wireless experience.
Creates an amazing, 3D 360-degree sound stage with unmatched spatial accuracy through 50mm speakers.
Enhanced DTS Surround Sound Modes and Presets
Custom DTS Surround Sound modes combine with enhanced Turtle Beach genre-specific presets to further immerse you in your favorite games, movies and music.
Dual hidden microphones, with environmental mic presets ensure you are always heard—regardless of your surroundings.
Built-in rechargeable battery and a low profile magnetic charging stand deliver up to 10 hours of wireless gaming without cables.
Enjoy wireless Bluetooth connectivity with all your mobile devices including PS Vita™.
The Ear Force Audio Hub app lets you instantly change presets using your mobile phone or tablet.
Even during loud gameplay spikes, chat volume automatically rises to ensure you never miss a command.
You demand the ultimate in performance, so you should get the ultimate in benefits, including extended warranty and concierge product support. See turtlebeach.com/elite for complete details.

string-array.name: prestigeBullets
string-array.item: Wireless to the Xbox One Console
Variable Mic Monitor and Multi-Step Bass Boost
Game-Chat Volume, Master Volume and Mic Controls

string-array.name: prestigeDetails
string-array.item: The Call of Duty® Advanced Warfare Ear Force® Sentinel Prestige for Xbox One is the ultimate arsenal upgrade. With its tournament-grade build quality, premium speakers and the all-new Ear Force Headset Audio Controller, the Sentinel Prestige will have you laser-focused on dominating your games.
The Sentinel Prestige for Xbox One delivers unmatched game and chat for an enhanced audio experience through premium 50mm Neodymium speakers.
Includes Ear Force® Headset Audio Controller
Turtle Beach-created Headset Audio Controller adds sought-after features like Mic Monitoring and Bass Boost!
Stop the shouting by adjusting the level of your own voice heard in your headset.
Dial up low-end thump with Multi-step Bass Boost for bone-jarring explosions.
Tournament-build quality with comfortable synthetic leather ear cushions.
Add a new set of plates to personalize the look of your headset from TurtleBeach.com/plates.
High-sensitivity, removable mic for chat on Xbox Live and Skype™.
Connect the included Headset Audio Controller to the Xbox One Controller for game and chat audio.
Disconnect from the Audio Controller to use the Sentinel Prestige with your mobile devices.
Headsets aren’t just great for games. Enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows with high quality sound. Then crank up your tunes from music services like Xbox Music™ or Skype™ with friends!

string-array.item: Wireless to the Xbox One Console
Variable Mic Monitor and Multi-Step Bass Boost
Game-Chat Volume, Master Volume and Mic Controls

string-array.name: taskForceXboxDetails
string-array.item: The Call of Duty® Advanced Warfare Ear Force® Sentinel Task Force for Xbox One raises your battle readiness with Variable Mic Monitoring, Bass Boost, volume and chat controls. Wireless to the Xbox One Console and fitted with comfortable synthetic leather ear cushions, you’re ready for the future of online warfare.
The Sentinel Strike Force for Xbox One delivers high-quality game and chat for an enhanced audio experience through full-range 50mm Neodymium speakers.
Includes Ear Force® Headset Audio Controller
Turtle Beach-created Headset Audio Controller adds sought-after features like Mic Monitoring and Bass Boost!
Stop the shouting by adjusting the level of your own voice heard in your headset.
Dial up low-end thump with Multi-step Bass Boost for bone-jarring explosions.
Synthetic leather ear cushions and an adjustable, padded headband for hours of comfort.
Add a new set of plates to personalize the look of your headset from TurtleBeach.com/plates.
High-sensitivity, removable mic for chat on Xbox Live and Skype™.
Connect the included Headset Audio Controller to the Xbox One Controller for game and chat audio.
Disconnect from the Audio Controller to use the Sentinel Task Force with your mobile devices.
Headsets aren’t just great for games. Enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows with high quality sound. Then crank up your tunes from music services like Xbox Music™ or Skype™ with friends!

string-array.name: taskForcePsBullets
string-array.item: High-Quality Game and Chat Audio for PS4™
Mobile Device and PS Vita™ Compatible
Variable Bass Boost, Master Volume and Mic Controls

string-array.name: taskForcePsDetails
string-array.item: Dominate future battles with the Call of Duty® Advanced Warfare Ear Force Sentinel Task Force Gaming Headset for PS4. High-quality digital game and chat audio driven by 50mm speakers set in a lightweight headset will have you engaged for hours of gameplay.
The Sentinel Strike Force for PS4 delivers high-quality digital game and chat for an enhanced audio experience.
Full-range 50mm speakers supported by synthetic leather mesh ear cushions for hours of comfort and noise-isolation.
Add a new set of plates to personalize the look of your headset from TurtleBeach.com/plates.
High-sensitivity microphone on a flexible, removable boom keeps you heard loud and clear.
One simple USB connection delivers all game and chat audio.
Disconnect from the in-line amp to use the headset on the go with your mobile devices including the PS Vita™.
Hear your voice in the headset so you don’t have to shout.
Dial up low-end thumps with variable Bass Boost.
Master volume, Bass Boost and mic mute controls at your fingertips.

Headsets aren’t just great for games. Use the headset for enjoying streaming movies and TV from Netflix™ and Hulu Plus™ or Blu-Ray Disc. Crank up your tunes on music services like Pandora™ and then chat with friends or make mobile calls!

string-array.name: blizzardBullets
string-array.item: Powerful 50mm Speakers with Noise-Isolating Ear Cushions
Works with Any PC, Mac or Mobile Device

string-array.name: blizzardDetails
string-array.item: The Turtle Beach® Heroes of the Storm™ Stereo PC Gaming Headset is your key to powerful upgrades and ultimate victory in the raucous online team brawler starring your favorite Blizzard characters. Hear every game detail though epic 50mm speakers, battle for hours in comfort, communicate clearly with teammates and personalize your headset with speaker plates of your favorite Blizzard heroes.
Powerful 50mm speakers deliver all the crisp highs and powerful lows.
Fully adjustable, high-sensitivity microphone on a removable boom.
Easy to access volume control and mic mute at your fingertips.
Personalize your headset and collect the full assortment of Heroes of the Storm plates at TurtleBeach.com/plates.
Breathable, around-the-ear cushions are optimized for noise isolation and long play sessions.
Simple 3.5mm setup with no software to install or manage.
Go beyond games! The Heroes of the Storm PC Gaming Headset will be your go-to headset for Skype™, mobile gaming, streaming videos, music and more.

string-array.name: marvelBullets
string-array.item: Customize with Three Included Character Decals!
Powerful Amplifier Adds Bass Boost for Xbox 360 and PC.
Use with PS4™, Wii U™, PS Vita or other Mobile Devices!

string-array.name: marvelDetails
string-array.item: Super power your sound with the Disney Infinity: Marvel Super Heroes Multiplatform Stereo Gaming Headset! Get massive sound from 50mm speakers to match the huge levels and incredible gameplay along with clear chat and unmatched comfort for a heroic gaming experience.
Personalize your headset from three included character decals!
Powerful 50mm Neodymium speakers deliver sizzling highs and thunderous lows.
Add more rumble to the game audio.
Set the balance of game and chat audio how you’d like.
Fully adjustable, high-sensitivity microphone on a removable boom.
Adjustable, around-the-ear design optimized for noise isolation and long play sessions.
Hear your own voice in the headset to avoid shouting into the mic.
Go beyond games and use the headset for Skype™, enjoying videos, music and more.
*Amplifier features available for Xbox 360 and PC/Mac.

string-array.name: starwarsBullets
string-array.item: Swappable Speaker Plates (Darth Vader Plates Included)
PC Cable with In-line Controls for Volume and Mic Mute
Perfect for Gaming on Tablets and Mobile Devices

string-array.name: starwarsDetails
string-array.item: Launch your games, movies and music into hyperspace with the Ear Force® Star Wars™ PC and Mobile Gaming Stereo Headset. Fully armed and operational with epic speakers and a comfortable design, the headset can be personalized with the included set of Darth Vader speaker plates! Compatible with PC, Mac® and all your favorite mobile gaming devices!
Full-range 50mm Neodymium speakers deliver crisp highs and powerful lows.
Includes set of Darth Vader swappable speaker plates!
Personalize the look of your headset with a new set of Star Wars™ plates from TurtleBeach.com/plates*.
PC Cable includes mic mute and master volume controls at your fingertips.
Breathable, around-the-ear cushions are optimized for noise isolation and long play sessions.
Fully adjustable, high-sensitivity microphone on a removable boom.
Simple 3.5mm setup with no software to install or manage.
Go beyond games! The Star Wars PC Gaming Headset will be your go-to headset for Skype™, streaming videos on Netflix™, music, mobile gaming and more.
*The availability of additional speaker plates varies by market and is subject to local restrictions.

string-array.name: titanfallAtlasBullets
string-array.item: Ready for any version of Titanfall
Includes Headset Adapter for Xbox One
In-line Amplifier for Xbox 360 \u0026 PC players

string-array.name: titanfallAtlasDetails
string-array.item: Engage in fast-paced, vertical warfare with the Titanfall™ Ear Force® Atlas Official Gaming Headset. Feel every bone-jarring footfall of your massive Titan, pinpoint enemy locations and stay in clear communication with other pilots as you battle for control of the Frontier.
Headphones are tuned to provide the highest quality audio from the Xbox One™ Audio Adapter.
Personalize game \u0026 chat mix volume, plus mic mute right at your fingertips.
High-quality removable mic for chat on Xbox One™, Skype™ and Xbox LIVE®.
Breathable mesh cushions on ear cups rotate-to-flat for wearing around your neck.
Built-in Bass Boost adds more depth and punch to the game audio (Xbox 360 \u0026 PC only).
Hear own voice in the headset to avoid shouting (Xbox 360 \u0026 PC only).

Ear Force Atlas isn’t just great for Titanfall. Enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows with superior quality sound. Then crank up your tunes from music services like Xbox Music™ or Skype™ with friends!
Perfect for gaming on your mobile phone, tablet or portable game devices.
Delivers superior audio quality with crisp highs and deep, rumbling lows.

string-array.name: px4Bullets
string-array.item: Bluetooth for Wireless Chat \u0026 Phone Calls

string-array.name: pxDetails
string-array.item: Enjoy completely wireless freedom for games plus Blu-Ray Disc™ and streaming video and music and PSN chat.
Pinpoint the direction of every sound in all your games and movies in Dolby® Digital Surround Sound.
Interference-free, dual-band wireless means clearer chat and game audio.
Dual-Pairing Bluetooth Brings Calls \u0026 Gaming Together
Take advantage of Bluetooth to answer mobile phone calls without ever leaving the game. Or pair the PX4 with any Bluetooth communication device, such as a PC, laptop or tablet.
Thickly padded, adjustable headband with breathable mesh ear cushions for marathon game sessions.
With multiple EQ presets including bass and treble boost combinations plus separate game and chat volume controls.

Headsets aren’t just great for games. Use your headset for listening to movies or TV in cinematic surround sound from video services like Netflix™ and Hulu Plus™ or Blu-Ray Disc™. Then crank up your tunes on music services like Music Unlimited™!
Built-in rechargeable battery delivers up to 15 hours of continuous play. You can even charge while playing.
Connect a second audio source (such as a phone or MP3 player) to the transmitter to listen to music when done gaming.
Chat volume automatically increases as the game volume gets louder.
Customize your audio experience by altering the positioning of the surround sound.
Personalize the balance of game and chat audio for the perfect mix.
Adjust the level of your voice heard in the headset, so you won’t have to shout.
PX4 can be plug into any 3.5mm jack with the included Mobile Device Cable.
*Not all features available with mobile game devices including game and chat volume mix control.
